duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides overnight support for assigned team to include receiving and preparing product and maintaining the floor, displays, and back stock in accordance with company standards.
Checks product to ensure it meets quality standards and maintains production standards.
Stocks and cleans shelves, bins, and food preparation areas.
Handles invoices for product delivered outside store receiving hours and reports miss-picks to team leadership.
Provides excellent customer service and addresses needs of customers in a timely and effective manner.
Maintains a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment, and immediately reports safety hazards and violations.
Performs opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned and ensures accuracy of signs and pricing.
Performs other duties as assigned by store, regional, or national leadership.
